summary: Modified meta-builder-agent.md to use batch insertion for TODO.md entries, ensuring foundational tasks appear higher in the file. Added batch building implementation pattern with Python pseudocode and updated DeliverSummary guidance.

completion_data.completion_summary: Modified TODO.md insertion logic in meta-builder-agent.md from prepend-each to batch insertion, ensuring foundational tasks created via /meta appear higher in the file (matching Task 37's topological sorting order).
